name: Routeur axé sur la confidentialité de l'IA : Détection des PII pour la confidentialité, la sécurité et la conformité
description:
## Les systèmes d'IA modernes sont puissants mais posent des risques pour la vie privée lors du traitement de données sensibles. 

Les organisations ont besoin de capacités d'IA tout en garantissant :

✅ Les données sensibles ne quittent jamais des environnements sécurisés
✅ Conformité aux réglementations (RGPD, HIPAA, PCI, SOX)
✅ Prise de décision en temps réel concernant la sensibilité des données
✅ Pistes de vérification complètes pour l'examen réglementaire

## Le concept :

Classification intelligente des données + Routage intelligent

L'objectif de ce concept est de poser les bases de l'utilisation sûre et conforme des LLM dans les flux de travail agentiques en détectant automatiquement les données sensibles, en appliquant des règles de désinfection et en routant intelligemment les demandes via des canaux de traitement sécurisés.

Ce flux de travail analysera l'entrée de chat ou de webhook de l'utilisateur et tentera de détecter les PII à l'aide du Détecteur de motifs PII amélioré. 

Si détecté, le flux de travail traitera cette entrée via une série d'étapes de conformité, d'audit et de sécurité qui enregistrent et désinfectent la demande avant que tout LLM ne soit sollicité.

## Pourquoi un routage multi-niveaux ? 
Les systèmes traditionnels utilisent des décisions binaires (sensible/pas sensible). Notre approche à 3 niveaux fournit :

✅ **Sécurité granulaire** : Les PII critiques bénéficient d'une protection maximale
✅ **Optimisation des performances** : Les données propres bénéficient de toutes les capacités cloud
✅ **Efficacité des coûts** : Traitement local coûteux uniquement lorsque nécessaire
✅ **Expérience utilisateur** : Maintient le flux de conversation à travers les niveaux de sécurité

## Pourquoi une détection contextuelle ?

Les motifs Regex à eux seuls manquent de sensibilité contextuelle. 
Notre approche :

✅ **Capture l'intention** : La discussion sur le "compte bancaire" est sensible même sans numéros de compte
✅ **Réduit les faux négatifs** : Les discussions médicales restent sécurisées même sans identifiants médicaux explicites
✅ **Protection proactive** : Identifie les contextes sensibles avant que les PII ne soient partagées
✅ **Alignement sur la conformité** : Correspond à la manière dont les réglementations définissent réellement les données sensibles

## Pourquoi le scoring de risque plutôt que la classification binaire ?
La détection binaire des PII crée des frontières artificielles. 

Le scoring de risque fournit :

✅ **Décisions nuancées** : Plusieurs motifs à faible risque peuvent s'agréger à un risque élevé
✅ **Seuils adaptatifs** : Les organisations peuvent ajuster la sensibilité en fonction de leurs besoins
✅ **Meilleure expérience utilisateur** : Les utilisateurs ne sont pas inutilement restreints pour des scénarios à faible risque
✅ **Transparence d'audit** : Raisonnement clair pour chaque décision de routage

## Pourquoi une surveillance complète ?
Les systèmes de confidentialité nécessitent confiance et vérification :

✅ **Preuve de conformité** : Les pistes de vérification démontrent la conformité réglementaire
✅ **Optimisation des performances** : Identifier les goulets d'étranglement et améliorer l'efficacité
✅ **Validation de la sécurité** : Assurer qu'aucune fuite de données sensibles ne se produit
✅ **Aperçus opérationnels** : Comprendre les modèles d'utilisation et la santé du système

## Comment installer :

Tout ce dont vous aurez besoin pour ce flux de travail sont des identifiants pour vos fournisseurs de LLM tels qu'Ollama, OpenRouter, OpenAI, Anthropic, etc. 

Ce flux de travail est personnalisable et permet à l'utilisateur de définir le meilleur LLM et les solutions de stockage/mémoire pour son cas d'utilisation spécifique.

workflow.name: Privacy-Minded Router: Enhanced PII Detection Workflow

parameters.content:
## Privacy-Minded Router: Enhanced PII Detection Workflow Concept [START HERE]

By: Charles Oh, https://www.linkedin.com/in/codetender/

* This living Concept is for DEMONSTRATION purposes only and is designed to be a starter framework for privacy-minded workflows. 

* You'll need credentials for your LLM model providers (click on the model on each agent and view the n8n docs for info)

## Understanding Your Privacy-First AI Architecture

🏗️**ARCHITECTURAL OVERVIEW**

**The Core Problem We're Solving**

Modern AI systems are powerful but pose privacy risks when handling sensitive data. Organizations need AI capabilities while ensuring:

✅ Sensitive data never leaves secure environments
✅ Compliance with regulations (GDPR, HIPAA, PCI, SOX)
✅ Real-time decision making about data sensitivity
✅ Comprehensive audit trails for regulatory review

**Our Solution/Concept:**
 
Intelligent Data Classification + Smart Routing

Instead of treating all data the same, we automatically classify each message and intelligently route it to the appropriate processing environment.

The processing and routing of the user's chat input occurs before any Agent or LLM model is queried.

If a user's query has detected PII, the request is categorized and logged for Compliance and Auditing prior to processing by Agent. The current setup can easily be routed and customized further for integrations with more robust Enterprise compliance platforms.

Note: This starter framework is still in beta and does not guarantee any compliance with regulations as this is a work in progress.

## Potential Use Case Examples:

For Healthcare Organizations

HIPAA Compliance: Medical data automatically routed through full audit pipeline
Patient Privacy: Zero risk of patient information reaching external systems
Audit Readiness: Complete documentation trail for regulatory reviews
Operational Efficiency: Clean queries get optimized cloud processing
Cost Optimization: Monitoring overhead only applied to sensitive data

For Financial Services

PCI/SOX Compliance: Payment and financial data gets complete audit trail
Customer Trust: Demonstrable commitment to data protection with real-time monitoring
Risk Management: Quantified risk assessment with automatic compliance flagging
Performance: Clean financial queries leverage advanced cloud AI capabilities
Regulatory Reporting: Automated compliance monitoring with detailed metrics

For Legal Firms

Attorney-Client Privilege: Sensitive case information never leaves local systems
Confidentiality Assurance: Multi-layer protection with comprehensive monitoring
Practice Efficiency: Research and non-confidential tasks use optimized cloud processing
Ethics Compliance: Meets professional responsibility requirements with audit trails
Dual Benefits: Maximum security for sensitive data, maximum capability for research

For Enterprise

Data Governance: Centralized control with intelligent processing path selection
Global Compliance: GDPR, privacy laws automatically enforced with real-time monitoring
Productivity: AI capabilities optimized for both security and performance
Cost Optimization: Pay for enterprise monitoring only when processing sensitive data
Production Ready: Real credentials, proven architecture, comprehensive monitoring

## Enhanced PII Pattern Analyzer 🧠

**What it does:**
The "brain" of the system - analyzes every message for sensitive information

**Technology**: 
JavaScript with crypto libraries

**Core Intelligence Features**:

A) 10 PII Pattern Types with Confidence Scoring

javascriptssn: {
  pattern: /\b\d{3}-\d{2}-\d{4}\b/g,     // Regex pattern
  confidence: 0.95,                       // 95% confidence this is PII
  severity: 'critical',                   // Highest security level
  mask: true                              // Hide in logs
}

B) Context-Aware Detection

- Financial Context: Detects bank, credit, loan, mortgage discussions
- Medical Context: Identifies patient, doctor, hospital, diagnosis terms
- Legal Context: Recognizes attorney, case, litigation language
- Personal Context: Finds family, address, personal information

C) Risk Scoring Algorithm
javascriptRisk Score = Σ(Pattern Confidence × Pattern Count)
Total Risk = SSN(0.95×1) + Email(0.85×1) + Phone(0.80×1) = 2.6

D) Automatic PII Masking
javascript"123-45-6789" → "12***-**-**89"  // Preserves structure, hides content

E) Data Classification

Confidential: Critical PII (SSN, Medical ID, Credit Cards)
Internal: High severity PII (Account numbers, Driver's licenses)
Public: Low/no PII content

**Output Example:**
json{
  "originalMessage": "My SSN is 123-45-6789",
  "maskedMessage": "My SSN is 12***-**-**89",
  "piiDetected": true,
  "riskScore": 0.95,
  "highestSeverity": "critical",
  "context": "personal",
  "detectedPatterns": [
    {
      "type": "ssn",
      "confidence": 0.95,
      "severity": "critical",
      "masked": true,
      "examples": ["12***-**-**89"]
    }
  ],
  "complianceFlags": {
    "gdpr": true,
    "hipaa": false,
    "pci": false,
    "sox": false
  }
}

## Processing Pipeline:

PII Data → Compliance Logger → Error Handler → Monitoring → AI Agent [Private]

**Why This Architecture:**

Complete Audit Trail: Every sensitive message gets full monitoring
Regulatory Compliance: Meets audit requirements for HIPAA, GDPR, etc.
Error Recovery: Automatic fallbacks if any monitoring component fails
Performance Tracking: Full metrics for sensitive data processing

## Key Capabilities:

OpenRouter account configured for cloud models

Enhanced Memory: 50-message context window for better conversations. Easily swapped to any database/Memory integration.

Direct Processing: Bypasses monitoring overhead for optimal performance

Full AI Power: Access to advanced cloud models (GPT-4, Claude, etc.)

Clean Data Assurance: Only processes pre-validated non-sensitive content

**Optimized Architecture:**
Clean Data → Agent [Edge] (Direct Path)

**Why This Approach Works:**

Performance Optimization: No monitoring overhead for clean data

Enhanced Experience: Better conversation flow with larger memory

Cost Efficiency: Pay for cloud processing only when safe and beneficial

User Experience: Maintains full AI capabilities for non-sensitive queries

## Compliance & Audit Logger 📋

What it does: Creates comprehensive, PII-safe audit trails
Technology: Advanced JavaScript with cryptographic session tracking
Audit Trail Components:
A) Session Tracking
javascriptsessionId: "a1b2c3d4e5f6...",  // Unique session identifier
messageId: "m1n2o3p4...",       // Per-message tracking
timestamp: "2025-07-11T..."     // Precise timing
B) Processing Metadata (No actual PII stored)
javascript{
  processingRoute: "local|cloud",
  routingReason: "Critical PII detected - using local model",
  piiDetected: true,
  riskScore: 2.75,
  context: "financial",
  dataClassification: "confidential"
}
C) Compliance Status
javascriptcomplianceFlags: {
  gdpr: true,    // EU personal data regulations
  hipaa: true,   // US healthcare data protection  
  pci: false,    // Payment card industry standards
  sox: true      // Financial reporting compliance
}
D) Performance Metrics
javascriptprocessingMetrics: {
  processingTime: 1247,        // Milliseconds
  inputLength: 45,             // Character count
  patternsChecked: 10,         // Number of PII patterns analyzed
  patternsDetected: 2          // Patterns found
}
Privacy-Safe Logging:

No PII Content: Only metadata and classifications stored
Masked Examples: If examples needed, only masked versions
Compliance Focus: Designed for regulatory audit requirements
Session Correlation: Track conversations without storing content

## Error Handler & Recovery 🛠️
 
What it does: Ensures system resilience and compliance even during failures
Technology: Comprehensive error detection with automatic recovery
Error Detection Categories:
A) Processing Errors

PII detection failures → Default to local processing (safe fallback)
Model unavailability → Route to backup processing
Network issues → Retry with exponential backoff

B) Compliance Violations

Sensitive data routed to cloud → Force redirect to local
Missing compliance flags → Apply conservative classification
Data leakage risk → Immediate alert and local-only routing

C) System Errors

Unexpected failures → Safe defaults with full logging
Resource exhaustion → Graceful degradation
Security breaches → Immediate lockdown procedures

Recovery Strategies:
javascript// Example: Compliance violation recovery
if (violations.length > 0 && routeToOrchestrator !== 1) {
  // Force local processing
  item.json.routeToOrchestrator = 1;
  item.json.routingReason = 'Compliance violation recovery - forced local';
  
  // Log the violation
  errors.push({
    type: 'compliance_violation',
    severity: 'critical',
    action: 'force_local_routing'
  });
}
Why This Matters:

Fail-Safe Design: System defaults to maximum security
Compliance Enforcement: Prevents accidental violations
Operational Resilience: Continues operating despite component failures
Audit Completeness: All errors and recoveries are logged

## Real-time Monitoring Dashboard 📊
 
What it does: Provides comprehensive system observability and alerting
Technology: Advanced metrics collection with intelligent alerting
Monitoring Categories:
A) Performance Metrics
javascriptperformance: {
  averageProcessingTime: 1247,    // Target: <2000ms
  piiDetectionAccuracy: 100,      // Target: >95%
  routingEfficiency: 100,         // Target: 100%
  systemLatency: 1247            // End-to-end timing
}
B) Security Metrics
javascriptsecurity: {
  piiLeakageRisk: 0,             // MUST be 0% (critical alert if >0)
  dataClassificationAccuracy: 100, // Accuracy of classification
  privacyScore: 95,              // Overall privacy protection
  riskScore: 2.1                 // Current message risk level
}
C) Compliance Metrics
javascriptcompliance: {
  gdprCompliance: 100,           // EU data protection
  hipaaCompliance: 100,          // Healthcare data protection
  pciCompliance: 100,            // Payment card security
  overallCompliance: 100         // Must be 100% for audit
}
D) System Health
javascriptsystem: {
  errorRate: 0,                  // Target: <5%
  recoveryRate: 100,             // Success rate of error recovery
  systemHealth: "healthy",       // healthy|degraded|critical
  uptime: 100                    // System availability
}
Intelligent Alerting:
Critical Alerts (Immediate Action Required)

PII Leakage Risk: Sensitive data routed to cloud
Compliance Violations: Regulatory requirements not met
System Failures: Components not responding

Medium Alerts (Review Required)

Performance Degradation: Processing time exceeding thresholds
Accuracy Issues: PII detection false positives/negatives
Resource Constraints: System approaching limits

Informational (Monitoring)

Usage Patterns: Traffic and routing statistics
Performance Trends: Historical metric analysis
Capacity Planning: Resource utilization trends

## A cleaned LLM Request

If PII was detected, the original request should now be here. In the previous steps, any detected PII should be masked. That masked version of the message is what we use in this AI Agent (Private)

user.name: Charles
user.bio: Community Strategist and Connector, with a deep love for all things tech. Currently nerding out about Community, AI, and the future of the internet.
